item.title: Networking Basics: What is an IP Address & IPv4 vs IPv6
item.category: "Networking" , "IP Addresses" , "Internet Protocols" , "IPv4" , "IPv6" , "Network Communication" , "Internet Connectivity" , "Technology" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Internet Security"
item.description: Discover the basics of IP addresses, including the difference between IPv4 and IPv6, their significance, and the importance of IPv6 adoption.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Exploring Network Services, Connectivity Options, and Architecture
item.description: Discover the functionalities of DHCP, DNS, and NTP services, understand corporate and datacenter network architecture, and explore cloud concepts and connectivity options for seamless communication and data management.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Mastering Network Ports and Protocols
item.description: Explore common network ports and protocols, their secure alternatives, and the importance of IP protocol types. Enhance network security and optimize communication.
